arts.ttl: Darren Yapiâ€™s two second-half goals lead Rapids to 2-1 victory over Minnesota United
arts.sum: Darren Yapi scored twice in the second half to spark the Colorado Rapids to a 2-1 victory over Minnesota United on Sunday night. Minnesota United (12-6-8) cut it to 2-1 in the 73rd minute when Tani Oluwaseyi took a pass from Joseph Rosales and scored his career-high 10th goal.
